scripts.start: cross-var cross-env NODE_ENV=development APP_NAME=$npm_package_name parcel index.html
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npx dataviz-deploy generate --dir dist && dataviz-deploy sync --folder dist lusi $npm_package_name
scripts.deploy:test: npm run build:test && npx dataviz-deploy generate --dir build && dataviz-deploy sync lusi-test $npm_package_name
scripts.build: cross-var cross-env NODE_ENV=production APP_NAME=$npm_package_name parcel build --public-url https://lusi-dataviz.ylestatic.fi/2019-doc-metoo/ index.html --out-dir ./dist && cross-var echo "https://lusi-dataviz.ylestatic.fi/$npm_package_name"
scripts.build:test: cross-var cross-env NODE_ENV=production APP_NAME=$npm_package_name parcel build index.html --public-url https://lusi-dataviz.test.ylestatic.fi/$npm_package_name/ --out-dir ./build && cross-var echo "https://lusi-dataviz.test.ylestatic.fi/$npm_package_name"
